author: system
content:
Note for User :
•▶ Continue - Continues current scenario. Useful if you don't know what to do.
•🗡 Generate Assault Scenario - Click this to start an assault focused scenario.
•🏹 Generate Stealth Scenario - Click this to start a stealth focused scenario.
•🛡 Generate Defense Scenario - Click this to start a defense focused scenario.
•🇷🇺 Spawn allies - Spawns friendly forces.
•🇺🇸 Spawn enemies - Spawns enemy forces.
